channel.title: Help please
channel.description:
new to this and got the server basic source, runserver and compile. i can play on it myself but cant update nothing. when i go to compile i get the following error:
note: stream.java uses or overrides a depreciated API. note: recompile with -xlint:depreciation for details. press any key to continue...

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @catharsis catharsis
item.description:
@catharsis wrote:

yup cheers dude, just didnt know =/

Read full topic

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @Blazpkr Blazpkr
item.description:
@Blazpkr wrote:

OK dude that is the message that you want that message meens your compile is working fine. Ok say if you want to make yourself a Admin go to your client notepad file also known as client.java. Press CTRL+F at the same time and press the button that says Find next keep pressing that until you come to something that says. //start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Yourname”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Yourname”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
Ok were it says your name put your name that you use in the server. The rights meen what options they have 3 is the server admin the leader. 2 is Admin gold crown. 1 is moderator silver crown. If you make yourself an admin with 3 rights you will not see your crown but other players will. Anyway i hope i have helped if you need anything else just ask

Read full topic
